name: Betweenstellar
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 51. Theme: Every 10 Seconds.

Humankind is employed by capitalist galactic empire. Work your bum to earn coins for your retirement.

You, as a human, work on a planet close to a black hole. Every ten seconds here means almost 10 years in galactic empire. You gotta complete the orders before your overlords die of old age!

Programming: Umut Zenger

Art & Design: Gokce Gobut

Design & Animation: Damla Sullu
